segments.text: Can you direct me to some fresh produce that's on sale ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we've got some great mangoes on sale .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's a fruit with a big seed in it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Peel the skin with a sharp knife , and throw out the seed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , they're on sale today for only $ 1 each .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They usually taste sweet , but they remind me of an orange .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How can I tell if they're ripe ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can buy them either ripe or unripe . Unripe ones are hard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The ones that are on sale are from Central America .
segments.speaker: S2
